messages.title: Victoria Hall - Help needed
messages.content: Can you spare time to help the newly formed steering committee prepare a bid to take over the running of this important community facility?

mentions.candidate: Kevin Sharkey has lived in Bebington for over 20 years, has been active in many local campaigns, and is currently working with local residents alongside Conservative Local Councillor, Sheila Clarke.

issues.governance: Kevin writes: 'The present Lib/Lab administration have let down the people of Bebington by the lame and lacklustre view it has towards ... power to listen to what local people want and to find out how I can help with their issues and problems.'

leaflet.personalStatement: Kevin says: '... with his experience and first hand local knowledge, Kevin is well placed to help local residents.'

politicalExperience.achievements: Has lived in Bebington for over 20 years, has been active in many local campaigns, and is currently working with local residents.

endorsements.endorsement: I am delighted that Kevin is leading the Bebington Action Team.
